```mermaid
---
config:
  theme: base
  flowchart:
    curve: cardinal
    shape: stadium
    padding: 4
  themeVariables:
    lineColor: "#220033"
    primaryColor: "#220033"
    primaryBorderColor: "#220033"
    primaryTextColor: "#EEAAFF"
---
flowchart RL
  umd(ğšğšğš›ğš–ğšğš¡)
  stb(ğŸ¶ğš¡ğŸ·ğŸ¹ğŸ¹ğŸ½)
  god(ğšğš—ğšŒğš›ğš¢ğš™ğš)
  bad(ğšğšğšŒğš›ğš¢ğš™ğš)
  way(ğšŠğš—ğšğš›ğš˜ğš’ğš)
  res(ğšŠğš ğšğšœğš˜ğš–ğš)
  lol(ğš’ğšœ)
  stb --- god
  stb --- bad
  res --- lol --- way

  classDef default stroke-width:8px,font-weight:bold;
  linkStyle default stroke-width:8px;
```

<!--
$${\color{#202020}!} \space {\color{#333}Nunca \space dejes \space de \space aprender} \space {\color{#202020}!}$$
-->
